action_SendResetPasswordLink.title: action_SendResetPasswordLink
action_SendResetPasswordLink.description: If true, will send a reset password link to the current contact's email address.

contactId.title: contactId
contactId.description: The contactId of the current messaging user. If this is blank, a new contact record will be created.

messagingSessionId.title: messagingSessionId
messagingSessionId.description: The messaging sessionId of the current messaging session.

new_Email.title: new_Email
new_Email.description:
The email address to use when updating or creating the contact. Ensure it follow correct email formatting. If no update is desired, this variable is empty.
This is required when creating a contact.

new_FirstName.title: new_FirstName
new_FirstName.description:
The First Name to use when updating or creating the contact. If no update is desired, this variable is empty.
This is required when creating a contact.

new_LastName.title: new_LastName
new_LastName.description:
The Last Name to use when updating or creating the contact. If no update is desired, this variable is empty.
This is required when creating a contact.

new_MailingCity.title: new_MailingCity
new_MailingCity.description: The Mailing/Shipping City to use when updating or creating the contact. If no update is desired, this variable is empty.

new_MailingCountry.title: new_MailingCountry
new_MailingCountry.description: The Mailing/Shipping Country to use when updating or creating the contact. Ensure it is a real country, suggest alternative real values if it's misspelt or fake. If no update is desired, this variable is empty.

new_MailingPostCode.title: new_MailingPostCode
new_MailingPostCode.description: The Mailing/Shipping Zip/Postal Code to use when updating or creating the contact. If no update is desired, this variable is empty.

new_MailingState.title: new_MailingState
new_MailingState.description: The Mailing/Shipping State or Province to use when updating or creating the contact. Ensure it is a real State or Province for the country, suggest alternative real values if it's misspelt or fake. If no update is desired, this variable is empty.

new_MailingStreet.title: new_MailingStreet
new_MailingStreet.description: The Mailing/Shipping Street to use when updating or creating the contact. If no update is desired, this variable is empty.

new_Phone.title: new_Phone
new_Phone.description: The phone or mobile to use when updating or creating the contact. Ensure it follows a real phone format. If no update is desired, this variable is empty.

storeId.title: storeId
storeId.description: The storeId of the related store, typically set by the Store__c field on the Messaging Session.
